ygData.subject: Petition
ygData.msgSnippet: So far I have to agree with everything on the board.  I am playing a Ranger now (not forever!  Just to see how she would do), and find myslef kicking butt.
ygData.messageBody:
So far I have to agree with everything on the board. I am playing a Ranger
now (not forever! Just to see how she would do), and find myslef kicking
butt. Once I get up to 15 or 16 I will compare my Ranger's abilities with
my Barbarian Warrior. Nevertheless, I agree 100% with taking away the skill
cap from Warriors. No reason a Warrior shouldn't be better at melee than
anyone else.

Let's do this. Put together a petition and post the email for Verant.

For the Honor and Glory of Rallos Zek;

Patty of Halas
Warrior Princess of the 16th Rank
username: Patricia
server: Bristlebane

or

Tree Huggers Rule!

Patty Tiger
Half Elf Ranger of the 6th Rank
username: Patty
server: Bristlebane
